dmca.title: Re: AAA Business -- Notice of Infringement for aaacreditrepair.org
dmca.body:
Dear Sir or Madam:

       As you may know, the American Automobile Association, or AAA, is a nearly 105-year-old association that provides its nearly 50,000,000 members with a wide variety of automobile, travel, legal, financial, insurance, and other products and services.

       In order to identify and distinguish its own products and services from those of others, the American Automobile Association employs numerous marks and logo designs, which it has registered as federal trademarks for the exclusive use of itself and its member clubs.  These registered marks include, among others, the 'AAA' mark, Triple A and the AAA oval logo design.

       Unauthorized businesses that use the American Automobile Association's designations, or confusingly similar designations, in conjunction with the sale of their own products and services may mislead consumers who are likely to confuse those products and services with those offered or approved by the American Automobile Association.  Such unauthorized use of the American Automobile Association
